TrialsWDistraction
This trial includes 3 sets, each including 6 levels.
For each level you will be provided with 3 lives.
If any user exhaust his/her all 3 lives then next level will start.
Answer should be in the same sequence as they are displayed.

For each level you will be provided with 3 lives.
If any user exhaust his/her all 3 lives then next game(with distraction) will start.
Answer should be in the same sequence as they are displayed.
This trial includes 3 sets, each including 6 levels.
For each level you will be provided with 3 lives.
If any user exhaust his/her all 3 lives that level will start again.
Answer should be in the same sequence as they are displayed not what you hear(distraction).
